Class Pit

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, javax.swing.Icon
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MancalaPit, RegularPit

    public abstract class Pit
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.Icon, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    This abstract class is used to factor all common fields and methods from the MancalaPit and RegularPit.
